name: RPG Companion Summoning
description: Generates an RPG companion to fight along side you
context:
[ Familiar summoning ]
[ Example: "Player {username} begins summoning magic, and summons a {reason}" ]

list.message: The ground opens up, and a skeleton crawls out of it wielding a sword made of bone.
A sudden gust of wind takes form as an elf infront of you, 'a pleasure to meet you,' it says.
A nearby sword begins to float and take on a purple glow, before coming to hover at your side.
A Wind fairy appears infront of you, its wings fluttering and giving off a blue glow.
A Lesser Spirit takes shape nearby, it circles you a few times before settling beside you.
